title: Extra: A Talk with a Covid Long Hauler, with Natalie Alford
itunes:title: Extra: A Talk with a Covid Long Hauler, with Natalie Alford
description:
Natalie Alford, a singer songwriter out of Chicago, started to feel sick in the spring. Now four months later, she's still sick. As a part of our conversation about the how health care in this country is going to have to change post-pandemic, I thought a one-on-one with someone hit with debilitating and longterm symptoms from covid would help illuminate what we're up against. 

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
